body_html:
@vrv, i tried following the other examples to refactor into contrib but im hitting a wall...

It compiles properly, but during runtime I cant find my op :(

RuntimeError: Op type not registered 'LSTMCellBlock'

any ideas, this is supposed to be registered in the contrib/rnn/kernels/lstm_ops.cc file, but somehow its not being loaded in the test? Im guessing this is more of a blaze BUILD rule rather than src code error? thanks!

command im running:

bazel test -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/contrib/rnn:all
